diff_act: 1.indicate the disconnection to all remaining drivers
3.display the controller's identity in the lead cab

regen.absent_element: indication of the controller's addition to the multi-driver call in other cabs
regen.new_specification: The system shall indicate to all drivers in the multi-driver call when the controller is added, including displaying the controller's identity in all cabs.

regen.absent_element: indication of the controller's identity when the lead driver initiates the call
regen.new_specification: The system shall display the controller's identity in the lead cab when the lead driver initiates a call to the controller and adds them to the multi-driver call.

regen.absent_element: indication of controller's identity when the lead driver initiates the call
regen.new_specification: The system shall display the controller's identity in the lead cab when the lead driver initiates a call to the controller and adds them to the multi-driver call.

label: Functional identity of the automatically added controller shall be displayed in the leading cab.
absence: display the identity of the automatically added controller
